# sgtourism

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The **sgtourism** R package contains the R code to recreate the official St.Gallen Tourism Dashboard.

## Installation

You can install sgtourism like so:

``` r
install.packages("sgtourism", repos = "https://swissstatsr.r-universe.dev" )
```

## Launch the app

``` r
library(sgtourism)

run_app() # launch the app locally
```
